A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have quite different feelings about this movie. I really like the main idea or metaphor of the film but I think that the post-production of the movie was really chaotic and unpleasant. It feels like the movie is a recopilation of scenes cutted and pasted. Also\, there are some scenes (like \"the Leia scene\") that are really really crazy and non-sense even if it is a sci-fi movie. \n\nOtherwhise\, I'm really pissed with the Disney tendency of jokes\, jokes and jokes with no reason at all. And the little animals on the island seems to be just a marketing idea...
